title: Would Pokémon yell at Pokémon if he was within a mile of a sex offender?
subtitle: A claim that the character of the expanded reality game Pokémon will scream when it comes within a mile of a sex offender from a joke website.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: "Pokémon" in Pokémon Gu will scream whenever a player is one mile away from the registered sex offender.
